title: A Not so Daily Reminder that Braum is the greatest male champion ever
body:
Face it Taric Braum is just so much more fabulous.

http://imgur.com/FohKe5v
I mean who can stand against such a mainly mustache?

http://imgur.com/JoaWrBg

Even Noxians fear the mighty mustache, something Garen can never accomplish. 
http://40.media.tumblr.com/b5fe9e337d150f887047de5ccf40739a/tumblr_n4uncr8xG91s2r283o1_1280.jpg

He's even a gym teacher

http://imgur.com/Cl4yrCt
[Unlike the other three I know who did this one :D](http://caitesith.deviantart.com/)

replies.body:
Lets take {{champion:201}} and fuse him with Alex Armstrong! What could possibly go wrong?!

http://pa1.narvii.com/5958/3c712f78fdd1859d5b05c645df521feac7b8a259_hq.gif + http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-c3dglqIyoVg/U6QqSLX-GII/AAAAAAAARus/CRvnVcxOsWg/s1600/FMAB+10.gif = https://i.ytimg.com/vi/i5pNE4hgCCY/maxresdefault.jpg

'Tis also makin' me wonder what would happen if someone confronted both Veigar an' Edward in one place at th' same time with a short joke an' they both, with 'eir small tempers, mistook it bein' directed at 'em solely...

Me look t'wards  {{champion:45}} **The Superb Villain** for answers, but I be also lookin' t'wards others **_(Like you, the reader)_** for thoughts on th' matter if our one, true _Final Boss_ doesn't appear due to his probable miniature free time.

Death... Lots of death...

http://i220.photobucket.com/albums/dd204/angelbabybat/FMA-1.gif

> Brah please everyone knows that no one can resist the mustache 
> http://imgur.com/SsPSioD
> 
> http://36.media.tumblr.com/2bc0dd29ceba2b1832e3b70e8d183819/tumblr_n65zwmZMpd1r4mr8ho2_1280.jpg

Talon does oftentimes get carried...
http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/131/0/3/bunny_talon_and_riven_by_yosukii-d7i20z7.jpg
But... He got married:
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lymppbwxVc1qe4wxi.jpg
And he educates the young and his fellow street urchins:
https://40.media.tumblr.com/1c4300ebd9dba4928955e792785a3eb6/tumblr_n2cu3wKoET1r4mr8ho1_500.png
http://40.media.tumblr.com/4da0e2be80bb8eeda4a1f6fa4a6a70b4/tumblr_n2cu3wKoET1r4mr8ho2_500.png

Talon's current position kinda makes him Harem Protagonist Bait. >.>
He was adopted into a family that already had 2 girls (Cass and Kat). He and Riven grew up on the streets of Noxus (though not stated if they even know each other). And LeBlanch is just flat out Mature Bait that is an ally of Talon's de-facto boss, Swain.
Not exactly "manly" in the same sense as Braum, but he could be considered "lucky" by jealous men that wish they were surrounded by girls.
He punched his way around the door, then tore it off its metaphysical hinges to stop a mountain.

Talon got his ass handed to him without much effort already. And he admits to being another mans servant. Though I would say Swain has proven himself the greatest. After all he managed to come out of nowhere and become leader of the strongest nation in the world. And became the boss of Talon's boss.
"The three deadliest blademasters in all of Valoran are...my father, [Katarina], and Talon." Just saying. And while Swain may be a good tactician, he is nowhere close to the martial prowess of Talon.

Three yes, but it is according to her so slightly biased, but more so top 3 isn't #1. Plus that is only in regards to people who use blades. Though that does make him stronger than most champions (due to blades being so common). Swains martial prowess is hard to judge as many of his fights that have been shown are hinted at being tricks. Such as him fighting J4 or the old leader. However it does say that he is usually at the front of battle, and yet he is still alive. 

He has been shown to have a high strength of will though:

"According to them, Swain limped into the ward without cry or complaint: his right leg was snapped in half, with bone protruding from the skin. A small, scowling bird seemed affixed to his shoulder. The doctor gawked in horror as the young adolescent answered questions about his health and age with a calm, even stare. Even behind the echoing crack as the sand counterweights reset his tibia, Swain’s measuring gaze never flickered, nor did his eyes twitch from the pop of his fibula. He refused the doctor’s recommendation of magical treatment for the leg’s inoperable damage, requesting only a spare crutch before shuffling away. "

And it wasn't a question of who is the best fighter, but best over all. So intelligence is a large part.
I would consider them equals, to be honest, if you factor in political and strategic thinking.
By be a conniving backstabbing sonovabitch
I mean, I would totally sleep with both, but assassins aren't too stable. If you're going for the long haul, Braum's the only choice.

{{champion:201}} : If at first you don't succeed, please, tell me what is it like!
{{champion:91}} : It was awful, I got my ass handed to me by a man with a parrot on his shoulder. 
{{champion:50}} : *stares* 
{{champion:91}} : CROW, I MEAN CROW! 
{{champion:201}} : Ha ha, perfect!
Hate to be that guy, but its a raven not a crow, crows are {{champion:9}} 's thing ;)

"Hate to be that guy :)"
No one should be ever ashamed of losing to swain.  He is badass incarnate

That's something a filthy accursed Noxus villain would say
Trolling is fun and all but at least keep it to a certain point. Don't be ridiculous. If you don't know much, go read some lore.
Darius is better. Covers himself head-to-toe in steel plating and slams weaklings with a 100 lb axe. He might be an asshole but damn is he cool.
His Axe probably isn't all that heavy, it's most likely all the force he uses when he swings that causes most the damage
Idk I just remember a youtube video where they forged a life-sized replica of his axe and it came out to 80lbs or so
